# storageMode

**Instance Property**

A value that configures the memory location and access permissions of tensors you create with this descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
var storageMode: MTLStorageMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property defaults to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStorageMode/shared].
title: storageMode
